hero.title: Freshness Delivered Globally
hero.subtitle: Exporting premium fruits and vegetables from Egypt since 2002, with a commitment to quality and sustainability.

about.title: Who We Are
about.subtitle: Premium quality produce export since 2002
about.description1: Since 2002, Al Sakr Group has been Egypt's premier exporter of fresh, high-quality fruits and vegetables. Our passion for excellence drives us to deliver the finest produce to international markets.
about.description2: We prioritize sustainability, innovation, and strong partnerships, ensuring every product from farm to table meets the highest standards of quality and freshness.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for global produce export

sorting.title: Sorting & Packing
sorting.description: Precision sorting and eco-friendly packing to preserve the natural freshness of our produce.

cooling.title: Cooling & Storage
cooling.description: Advanced cooling technology to maintain optimal quality during storage.

logistics.title: Global Logistics
logistics.description: Seamless delivery to ensure your produce arrives fresh, anywhere in the world.

farming.title: Sustainable Farming
farming.description: Eco-friendly farming practices that respect the environment while ensuring quality.

quality.title: Quality Control
quality.description: Rigorous quality checks at every stage from farm to shipping.

market.title: Market Analysis
market.description: Expert insights on global market trends and consumer preferences.

products.title: Our Premium Products
products.subtitle: Explore our range of organic, seasonal, and exotic produce, sourced from trusted farms

certifications.title: Our Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Our commitment to quality is backed by international certifications

iso.title: ISO 22000
iso.description: Ensuring top-tier food safety management systems throughout our operations.

haccp.title: HACCP
haccp.description: Hazard Analysis Critical Control Point compliance for food safety.

globalGap.title: GLOBALG.A.P.
globalGap.description: Adhering to Good Agricultural Practices for sustainable farming.

organic.title: Organic Certification
organic.description: Meeting strict standards for organic produce cultivation.

global.title: Our Global Presence
global.subtitle: Delivering fresh products to customers across six continents

contact.subtitle: Do you have any questions or are you interested in our products? Feel free to reach out to us.
